page.title: 20DESCRIPTION OF GROUP
page.content: The group working on this project is 11-12 year olds from Clinton Combined School,Kenilworth. The School is in a middle class residential area. It is a modern building opened in 1963. There are seven classes. There are about 175 people in the whole school.Our school uniform is a blue jumper and black trousers,a grey skirt for the girls. There are 21 children and 3 adults who are helping to do the project. Their names are;-Neil Boardman,Anthony Brooks, Neil Clifford,Matthew Collinson,Daniel Easter,Kristian Eyden,Guy Hankins, Geoffrey Hodson,Ross McGarry, Christopher Morris,Karl Oswin,Justin Vaughan,Adelle Ashley,Clare Casewell, Joanne Duffield-Harding,Jill Johnston, Sharron Lynn,Sharon Mold,Tessa Mckenzie,Amanda Rooke and Deborah Wilson,Mr.Higton,Mrs.Wright,Mrs.Hosking
